content: --अयनं {1} an elixir of life (elixir vitæ), any medicine supposed to prolong life and prevent old age; निखिलरसायनमहितो गंधेनोग्रेण लशुन इव <ls>R. G.</ls> {2} (<ab>fig.</ab>) serving as an elixir vitæ, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} that which gratifies or regales; आनंदनानि हृदयैकरसयनानि <ls>Māl. 6. 8</ls>; मनसश्च रसायनानि <ls>U. 1. 37</ls>; श्रोत्र°, कर्ण° &c. {3} alchemy or chemistry. {4} any medicinal compound. {5} butter-milk. {6} poison. {7} long pepper. (--नः {1} an alchemist. {2} <ab>N.</ab> of Garuḍa. (--नी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {1} a channel for the fluids of the body. {2} <ab>N.</ab> of several plants: --गुडूची, काकमाची, महाकरंज, गोरक्षदुग्धा, and मांसच्छदा.
